Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Kirt Manwaring
Dear Sir,
Kirt Manwaring is hitting the ball well at AA Wichita Wranglers!
He has an AVG of .279, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Monday, 5/22/1991
Subject: Status of Alex Arias
Dear Sir,

the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Regards,
Bryn Smith



Date: Wednesday, 5/24/1991
Subject: Status of Ivan Cruz
Dear Sir,
Ivan Cruz shouldn't play at AA Wichita Wranglers!

be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Monday, 6/5/1991
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.

I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Bill Latham
